snippet: Residents in the military town of Oceanside, Calif., say the system to deal with sexual assault cases is not fair to the victims.
abstract: Interviews with residents of military town of Oceanside, Calif, reveal that many veterans and active-duty military personnel believe system to deal with sexual assault cases is not fair to victims; say that many commanders who are in charge of deciding which sexual assault cases to prosecute conceal far too much out of fear that cases will taint their own careers.
lead_paragraph: Residents in the military town of Oceanside, Calif., say the system to deal with sexual assault cases is not fair to the victims.

headline.main: In a Military Town, Calls Grow to Lift the Voices of Sexual Assault Victims
headline.print_headline: In a Military Town, Calls Grow to Lift the Voices of Sexual Assault Victims

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
